aboutUs1: We are an international trading company dealing with all commodities, this includes: food items, flour, olive oil, apple vinegar, organic products and more.
aboutUs2: We also work with medical equipment, both trading and repairing of equipment such ultra sound machines and laboratory equipment.
aboutUs3: We work in oil and gas services, representing an international drilling company. We provide oil tools and all services related to drilling processes.
aboutUs4: We provide services related to gold, diamonds and valuable stones mining and shipping, logistics, training and consulting.
aboutUs5: Finally, we work in real estate investments and development.
